title: 180g Carb per Hour, Chinese Carbon, and a Controversial Calendar: How XDS-Astana Reversed out of Relegation Crisis
content:
XDS-Astana bridged a 5,000-point chasm to climb clear of UCI WorldTour relegation. The team reveals to Velo how it reinvented its performance program to make it happen.

Read the full article at 180g Carb per Hour, Chinese Carbon, and a Controversial Calendar: How XDS-Astana Reversed out of Relegation Crisis on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
